me.googas.commons.time

Enum Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Unit>
      • me.googas.commons.time.Unit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Unit>

    public enum Unit
extends Enum<Unit>
    Represents a time unit

      • fromMillis

        public static Unit fromMillis(long millis)
        Get a unit using milliseconds. This will loop to get the highest unit with the milliseconds given this means that:

        If the parameter is 300,000 the given unit would be MINUTES as it is lower but the highest from the lower units.

        This method ignores the units with millisObtainable as false.

        Parameters:
        millis - the milliseconds to get the unit from
        Returns:
        the unit given by the millis

      • fromTimeUnit

        public static Unit fromTimeUnit(@NotNull
                                @NotNull TimeUnit unit)
        Get an unit using a TimeUnit. It will use the fromMillis(long) and the millis used are given using TimeUnit.toMillis(long) using a duration of "1"
        Parameters:
        unit - the java unit to get this type of unit from
        Returns:
        the unit that matches the milliseconds given by the java unit

      • isMillisObtainable

        public boolean isMillisObtainable()
        Get whether this unit can be obtained from milliseconds
        Returns:
        true if it can be obtained from milliseconds

      • millis

        public long millis()
        Get this unit millis
        Returns:
        this unit millis

      • millis

        public long millis(long duration)
        Get this unit millis multiplied by the duration. Simple as it is this unit millis multiplied by the duration
        Parameters:
        duration - to multiply this unit millis to
        Returns:
        the millis of the unit given the duration

      • toTimeUnit

        public TimeUnit toTimeUnit()
        Get this unit as TimeUnit. It will do a loop similar that the one made in fromMillis(long) but given the TimeUnit.values()
        Returns:
        the time unit given by this unit
